com.pacman.game
Class MovableObject

java.lang.Object
  com.pacman.game.MovableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ghost, Pacman
public class MovableObject
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a basic object that is placed on the maze, and that is always aligned to the gridlines of the maze. Pacman and ghost are derived from this class

Author:
Thaer

Nested Class Summary
static class MovableObject.Direction
          Direction with some helper methods to convert between vectors and direction enums
